Row.Text: Each city can build one more district than usual (exceeding the normal limit based on [ICON_Citizen] Population). Builds Encampment and Industrial Zone districts in half the time.

Units ignore additional [ICON_Movement] Movement costs from embarking and disembarking. Land units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in land tiles adjacent to Coast. naval units receive +5 [ICON_Strength] Combat Strength in shallow water tiles. +50% [ICON_Production] Production toward Melee units.
I am the class-3 of Army's special transport 'Akitsu Maru', sir. Please leave transportation and landing combat to me, sir. My pride is this Daihatsu, sir. I'm different from the mouse and mole, sir.

Akitsumaru unique Modern era support unit. Adds +1 [ICON_Range] Range to Frigate, Battleship and Missile Cruiser. [NEWLINE]Naval units after the Renaissance era gains +9 [ICON_Strength] Strength when attacking to naval raider units. [NEWLINE]Reveal stealth units in view.
Akitsumaru unique unit: Ka Type Observation Autogyro
Akitsumaru unique Modern era melee unit that replaces the Infantry. +5 [ICON_GreatGeneral] Great General points for killing units.

Akitsumaru unique building that replaces Armory. +2 [ICON_Production] Production, +1 [ICON_Science] Science. All strategic resources gain +1 [ICON_Production] Production. +50% combat experience for all land units trained in this city.
Akitsumaru unique building: Imperial Army Armory
